table_caption: Background information and data on perceptual speed for the cognitive and DTI subsamples.
table_foot: Note. DTI = diffusion tensor imaging, MMSE = Mini-Mental State Examination, APOE = apolipoprotein E, PS = perceptual speed.a based on self-report, inpatient register, use of oral glucose-lowering agent or insulin injection, or HbA1c ≥5.4%b ≥160/100 mm Hg or use of antihypertensive agents
